per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = 1-abs(wave_r);
per_frame_7=ob_g = 1-abs(wave_g);
per_frame_8=ob_b = 1-abs(wave_b);
per_frame_9=q1 = wave_r;
per_frame_10=q2 = wave_g;
per_frame_11=q3 = wave_b;
per_pixel_1=kdx=dx;
per_pixel_2=kdy=dy;
per_pixel_3=ksx=sx;
per_pixel_4=ksy=sy;
per_pixel_5=krt=rot;
per_pixel_6=kzm=zoom;
per_pixel_7=kcx=cx;
per_pixel_8=kcy=cy;
per_pixel_9=kwp=warp;
per_pixel_10=
per_pixel_11=dx=0;
per_pixel_12=dy=0;
per_pixel_13=sx=1;
per_pixel_14=sy=1;
per_pixel_15=rot=0;
per_pixel_16=zoom=1;
per_pixel_17=cx=.5;
per_pixel_18=cy=.5;
per_pixel_19=warp=0;
per_pixel_20=
per_pixel_21=box=1+(rd*5.9*sin(time*0.1))%2 + 2*(y*3*sin(time*0.076))%2;
per_pixel_22=q1 = 8.3+(sin(x+0.137*q8)-cos(y+0.213*q8));
per_pixel_23=zoom=if(above(box,1), (rd*sin(x*40))*(rd*sin(Y*40))*0.1+.9,zoom);
per_pixel_24=rot = if(above(box,1),5*sin(0.000185* time ),rot);
per_pixel_25=dx=if(above(box,1),dx,q4*sin((y-0.5)*q3)+q5*sin((y-0.5)*q2));
per_pixel_26=dy=if(above(box,1),dy,-q6*0.03*cos((x-0.5)*q2)+q7*cos((x-0.5)*q3));
per_pixel_27=rd=(1.2+0.3*sin(time*0.2)+0.4*sin(q8))*sqrt( sqr( (x-0.5-q4)*1.7) + sqr( (y-0.5+q5)*1.2 ) );
per_pixel_28=cx=0.5+0.3*sin(time*0.051);
per_pixel_29=cy=0.5-22*q5;
per_pixel_30=
per_pixel_31=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_32=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.15*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_33=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.165*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_34=
per_pixel_35=six = sin(x);
per_pixel_36=
per_pixel_37=dx = dx + 0.1*sin(abs(12*y))*sin(time);
per_pixel_38=dy = dy + 0.1*sin(abs(12*x))*cos(time);
per_pixel_39=dx = if(above(y,.93),.01,if(below(y,.01),if(below(x,.3),if(below(y,.5),0,-.01),-.01),0));
per_pixel_40=dy = if(below(x,.05),.01,if(above(x,(0.94 - q7)),-.01,0));
per_pixel_41=zoom = if(above(x,.09),if(below(x,.85),if(above(y,.09),if(below(y,.85),.95,1),1),1),1);
per_pixel_42=dy = if(below(y,.5),if(below(x,.3),.01,dy),dy);
per_pixel_43=rot = if(above(x,.09),if(below(x,.85),if(above(y,.09),if(below(y,.85),0.1*sin(sin(ang*0.1*ang)+rad*6+q8*.444),0),0),0),0);
per_pixel_44=//cen_x = cos(time)*.2+.3;
per_pixel_45=//cen_y = sin(time)*.5+.5;
per_pixel_46=cen_x = q1;
per_pixel_47=cen_y = q2;
per_pixel_48=radxy = sin(time*.1)*.2+.3;
per_pixel_49=
per_pixel_50=dist_x = (x-cen_x)/(radxy*(sin(time*.2*0)*.3+cos((cen_x-x+ (cen_y-y))*10+time*2)*.3+1));
per_pixel_51=dist_y = (y-cen_y)/(radxy*(sin(time*.2*0)*.3+sin((cen_x-x+ (cen_y-y))*10+time*2)*.3+1));
per_pixel_52=in = below(abs(dist_x),1)*below(abs(dist_y),1);
per_pixel_53=//in = bnot(in);
per_pixel_54=out = bnot(in);
per_pixel_55=inx =(cen_x-q1)+.1*sign(dist_x)*(1-abs(dist_x));
per_pixel_56=iny =(cen_y-q2) +.1*sign(dist_y)*(1-abs(dist_y)); // .05*pow(dist_y,1);
per_pixel_57=
per_pixel_58=//**********outside
per_pixel_59=vang=time*.1;
per_pixel_60=vx = (x-.5)*cos(vang) - (y-.5)*sin(vang)+.5;
per_pixel_61=vy = (x-.5)*sin(vang) +(y-.5)*cos(vang)+.5;
per_pixel_62=
per_pixel_63=dvx=.01*sin(time+vy*80*radxy);
per_pixel_64=dvy=.01*cos(time+vx*80*radxy);
per_pixel_65=
per_pixel_66=outx = dvx*cos(vang) - dvy*sin(vang);
per_pixel_67=outy = -dvx*sin(vang) - dvy*cos(vang);
per_pixel_68=
per_pixel_69=dx=in*inx+out*outx;
per_pixel_70=dy=in*iny+out*outy;
per_pixel_71=cr1=0;
per_pixel_72=cr2=1;
per_pixel_73=crx=cr2-cr1;
per_pixel_74=ci=x*1.5+.25;
per_pixel_75=cb=.25  ;
per_pixel_76=crs=2;
per_pixel_77=cr=pow(sin(ci*6.3-(cb*6.3))/2+.5,crs)*crx+cr1;
per_pixel_78=cqr=if( above (ci,.25+cb),cr,crx+cr1);crr=if( below(ci,1.5),cqr,crx+cr1);
per_pixel_79=jx1=crr;
per_pixel_80=kx1=1-crr;
per_pixel_81=
per_pixel_82=jdx=dx;
per_pixel_83=jdy=dy;
per_pixel_84=jsx=sx;
per_pixel_85=jsy=sy;
per_pixel_86=jrt=rot;
per_pixel_87=jzm=zoom;
per_pixel_88=jcx=cx;
per_pixel_89=jcy=cy;
per_pixel_90=jwp=warp;
per_pixel_91=
per_pixel_92=dx=(jx1*jdx+kx1*kdx);
per_pixel_93=dy=(jx1*jdy+kx1*kdy);
per_pixel_94=sx=(jx1*jsx+kx1*ksx);
per_pixel_95=sy=(jx1*jsy+kx1*ksy);
per_pixel_96=rot=(jx1*jrt+kx1*krt);
per_pixel_97=zoom=(jx1*jzm+kx1*kzm);
per_pixel_98=cx=(jx1*jcx+kx1*kcx);
per_pixel_99=cy=(jx1*jcy+kx1*kcy);
per_pixel_100=warp=(jx1*jwp+kx1*kwp);
